content.raw:
What matters is the scale for angular in z and linear on x because since you can not control the other axis, so I would say we can delete the commented code and ignore those values. 

If we cant have separated parameters with scale\_linear\_vel and scale\_rotate for example we can leave the same vector that we have with a comment in the SDF explaining that only linear x and angular z are used.
content.html:
What matters is the scale for angular in z and linear on x because since you can not control the other axis, so I would say we can delete the commented code and ignore those values.

If we cant have separated parameters with scale_linear_vel and scale_rotate for example we can leave the same vector that we have with a comment in the SDF explaining that only linear x and angular z are used.
